A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Judged as a movie alone\, The Last Jed is a catastrophic failure of basic storytelling and narrative logic. Judged as a Star Wars movie\, it is calculated to disappoint and frustrate the fans who have supported this franchise and to betray it's basic contract with the audience: to entertain. Instead\, the Last Jedi is a political medium saying that women are the true heroes\, men are either evil or fueled entirely by emotion\, that heroism is not about sacrifice--unless it is done by a woman. Essentially\, it's main message is that men and women cannot co-exist on equal terms in peace.
